ColorUtility.Color - Enum in main.formatting.utility
 
Command - Class in main.command
The base Command class.
All commands should extend this class.
Overwrite the isValidArguments(), isCommandAllowed() and executeAction() to implement the command's functionality.

If you wish for the command to be executed on existing tasks, try extending TargetedCommand, which extends this class, instead.
Command(ManagerHolder) - Constructor for class main.command.Command
 
CommandController - Class in main.command
Handles the parsing of commands.

create() - Static method in class data.taskinfo.TaskInfo
Default constructor for TaskInfo.
Always use this when creating a new task.
Initialises priority and status to their default valies.
They shouldn't be initialised as null.
